q: 37 points and Josh Smith added 29 to help the Denver Nuggets beat the Cleveland Cavaliers 122-100 on Monday night. ''They didn't steal my spotlight,'' said Carmelo Anthony , who had 22 points and nine rebounds. They did what they were supposed to do. They took advantage of the defense that they threw at us. 23 minutes ago By DEE-ANN DURBIN, AP Auto Writer Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. ''We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products
